initialFeed.title: SECURITY ALERT TRIGGERED
initialFeed.details: Motion sensors activated in Gallery Wing B.

initialFeed.title: SUSPECT LEFT SCENE
initialFeed.details: Individual matching description spotted leaving north entrance.

initialFeed.title: BACKUP UNITS DISPATCHED
initialFeed.details: Additional patrol units en route to scene.

initialFeed.title: WITNESS STATEMENT RECEIVED
initialFeed.details: Visitor provided description of individual seen near exit.

initialFeed.title: INITIAL REPORT RECEIVED
initialFeed.details: Security staff reported suspicious activity in main gallery.

newEvents.title: PERIMETER ESTABLISHED
newEvents.details: Units have secured all exits and entrances.

newEvents.title: DRONE OVERWATCH LAUNCHED
newEvents.details: Aerial surveillance is now active over the area.

newEvents.title: COMMAND POST SET UP
newEvents.details: Mobile command post operational at corner of Main & First.

initialFeed.title: 911 CALL RECEIVED
initialFeed.details: Caller reported loud shouting and items being thrown in a neighboring residence.

initialFeed.title: PATROL UNIT DISPATCHED
initialFeed.details: Unit 12B en route to 123 Maple Avenue, University Park.

initialFeed.title: UNIT ARRIVED ON SCENE
initialFeed.details: Unit 12B is on site. Reports no audible signs of distress from the exterior.

initialFeed.title: CONTACT MADE WITH RESIDENTS
initialFeed.details: Officers are inside speaking with the parties involved.

initialFeed.title: SITUATION APPEARS STABLE
initialFeed.details: No signs of physical altercation. Officers report the verbal argument has ceased.

newEvents.title: MEDIATION IN PROGRESS
newEvents.details: Officers are mediating a resolution between both individuals.

newEvents.title: SEPARATION PLAN AGREED
newEvents.details: One party has voluntarily agreed to stay with a relative for the night.

newEvents.title: RESOURCES PROVIDED
newEvents.details: Officers provided both parties with domestic violence resource pamphlets.

newEvents.title: UNIT CLEAR FROM SCENE
newEvents.details: Unit 12B has cleared the scene. Situation resolved without arrest.

initialFeed.title: SILENT ALARM TRIGGERED
initialFeed.details: Panic button activated at First National Bank, teller station 3.

initialFeed.title: ALL AVAILABLE UNITS DISPATCHED
initialFeed.details: Multiple units responding to a 211 in progress.

initialFeed.title: FIRST UNIT ON SCENE
initialFeed.details: Unit 24 reports arrival, establishing perimeter around the bank.

initialFeed.title: SUSPECT DESCRIPTION BROADCAST
initialFeed.details: Suspect is male, 5'10", wearing a black hoodie, fled on foot northbound.

initialFeed.title: AERIAL SUPPORT REQUESTED
initialFeed.details: Air-1 requested for city-wide search of the downtown area.

newEvents.title: WITNESSES BEING INTERVIEWED
newEvents.details: Detectives are on scene gathering statements from employees and customers.

newEvents.title: SURVEILLANCE FOOTAGE OBTAINED
newEvents.details: Bank has provided internal and external video footage to investigators.

newEvents.title: SUSPECT VEHICLE IDENTIFIED
newEvents.details: Witness reported suspect entering a blue sedan, license plate partial 'TX-L5...'

newEvents.title: ALL-POINTS BULLETIN ISSUED
newEvents.details: APB issued for suspect and vehicle to all surrounding law enforcement agencies.
